1111.content:
Immediately recognizing the unique situation you have just stumbled upon, you shove all morals behind you and slowly shut the door. The gym leader, who is bound and blindfolded in a spread eagle position on a metal table in the room, hears the latch of the door close and cranes her next towards the sound.

"Who's there?" She shouts, barely covering up the nervous tension in her voice.

Assuming that the blindfold does indeed work, you make your way into the room saying nothing to preserve your identity. This seems to unnerve the compromised Misty.

"I don't know what you Team Rocket creeps are doing, but you aren't going to get anything out of me! Soon enough my friends will be here to break me out!"

You now stand at the side of the table with Misty stretched out in front of you. Slowly you move your hand closer and closer to her exposed midriff until your fingers softly touch the smooth skin of her belly. Misty twitches and pulls back as if she was touched by a hot burner.

"H-hey! Don't do that!" she yelps nervously, now unable to contain the fear in her voice.

You once again reach out and touch her belly, but you now maintain contact and start your index finger on a meandering journey along the trapped girl's midriff. A slight twitch appears along the corners of the girls mouth.

"T-tickling? Y-you think t-tickling can -hehe- b-break me? I'm-m-m not even -he- t-ticklish." she says, obviously holding back giggles.

Your response is a quick flurry of all your fingers on your right hand along her side, which causes her to jump in her bonds and squeal.

"O-ok. I'm a l-l-little bit t-ticklish. B-but I'll n-never tell you anything!"

You then start the fingers of your left hand wiggling along one side of her belly, while the index finger of your right hand starts a slow spiral circling her navel. Misty is now producing a steady stream of giggle, still doing her best to hold them in, but becoming less and less successful.

"Hehehehehehahehe st-t-t-toooooop thaaaaaat hehehehehe." she laughs, rhythmically turning in her bonds from side to side, trying to avoid the soft tickling sensations being pressed into her smooth belly.

You speed up the fingers on your left hand as your index finger gets closer and closer to her shallow navel, every rotation bringing it just a millimeter towards its ultimate goal. Misty's laughs are now progressing into a steady stream. Finally, after what seems like an eternity to both the ticklee and the tickler, your finger dips into her belly button and you begin the vibrate it back and forth violently. Misty lets out a high pitched scream that slowly dissolves into silent laughter, twisting and turning in her bonds as hard as she can. You continue to keep your finger in her navel whilst spider tickling the rest of her belly with your left hand quite rapidly.

After a while, the harsh tickling seems to be making Misty's belly less sensitive, as she now is pulling less on her bonds and is laughing only as much as she was at the beginning.You decide it's time to switch up tactics.

113.content:
you are sitting in the back of the moving van when it trundles to a stop. jumping out of the opening door, you look around your new home, littleroot town. you decide to take a look around the town.
"Be back soon, Dusk" your mom calls after you.
"Ok mom" you call back as you start off. looking around, you can't help but notice the different people. "This is alot different than kanto" you say to yourself before bumping into a girl in a red bandana. "Er, sorry about that" you say, looking from the girl to the floor.
"It's alright" she says, rather embarresed herself. "I'm May"
"Oh right" you say, "I'm Dusk. I just moved here"
May meanwhile, is looking for something. you look at her rather confused and poke her in the side. she giggles and jumps away from you.
"Oh, you're ticklish?" you say giggling.
"Are you?" she says slyly as she runs her fingers along your sides
"HEYHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAQUIHIHIHIHIHIHIHIHIHITITHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA" you squeal with laughter as you back off. you grin at May and suddenly run your fingers along her sides, causing her to scream with laughter. as you stop May has a devilish look on her face
"I am definantly going to get you for that" May says, getting ready to tickle you.
you turn on your heel and run for it. "YOU'RE GONNA HAVE TO CATCH ME FIRST!" you yell back. May grins and starts chasing after you.
At a hill on the outskirts of the town, you stop to catch your breath.
113.title: fun in littleroot town

1131.content:
As you regain your breath, you hear a twig crack. your ears pricked up, you spun round to face the noise and find yourself on your back. May is kneeling on your arms which are now pinned above your head and your legs were stuck in the branches of a bush. unable to reach your feet, May's thinking about where to start.
"I think i'll start here" she says, pulling off her gloves amd slipping her hands into the sleeves of your shirt and aiming for your underarms. "Tickle tickle" she taunts as her nails scrape across the hairless hollows of your arms making you go beserk.
"AAAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA" you start laughing the second May's nails touch your underarms.
"Wow Dusk, you really are ticklish" she teases you as you thrash about in ticklish agony. "Where should i try to tickle him now, since i can't reach his feet?"

11311.content:
Deciding that your underarms have had enouth attention, May pulls her hands out of your sleeves. You pant for a while before your breathing returns to normal, then look up in mock horror to see May pulling up the your shirt to reveal your flat pale tummy.

''You wouldn't!'' you remark playfully. May turns to you and gives you a evil ''Oh yes i would!'' grin.

''I might not....'' She says.

You sigh with relief. Then may finishes her sentence.

''IF you say that i'm the greatest tickler of all time, and your my ticklish little victim.''

''What?!'' You think with a mixture of shock and anger. ''She wants me to say what?!''

Needless to say, there's no way your EVER going to give into that request! Your suppost to be a big strong boy. If word got around town that a girl had broken you with tickle torture, your new classmates would NEVER let you hear the end of it!

Not only that, but you were having WAY too much fun to have it stop so soon! You'd never expected to have this much fun on your first day in littleroot. The exchange in town, The chase and now this. Besides, it isn't as if you have a tickle phobia or anything.

''No way!'' You tell her instantly. ''Anyway, your the one who's more ticklish. Otherwise i wouldn't have tickled you silly back in town!''

May smiles evily. She can tell your being playful which makes things twice as much fun.

''Ok.'' she says in a sing song tone. ''prepare to face the wrath of an expert tickler!''

''If only we knew where to find one.'' you reply, cockaly.

Big mistake.

The moment these words pass your lips, may digs her fingers into you tummy. You try to hold back the giggles, but give up after 5 seconds.

''HAHAHAHAHAHAHA! CUHUHUT IT OUT MAY! AAAAHAHAHA! C'MOHOHON!'' Despite your begging, you have to admit this does lighten your mood by alot. Not to mention it takes your mind off of your old town and friends.

May continues the "torture" by slowly drawing circles around your belly button. ''Coochie coochie coo.'' she sang. ''Aww. Has widdle Dusky have a ticklish tummy? I think he does.'' She sings, tickling your navel with her pinky. ''Yes he does!''

Your giggling goes up a pitch higher. Baby talk has always been your weakness in tickle fights.

''Hehehehey. Bahaby tahahalk isn't fahahahahir. hehehehehehahaha!'' You giggle uncontrollably. You try to squirm away, but with your legs trapped in the bushes that almost impossible.

May meanwhile is enjoying herself almost as much as you. ''Tickle tickle, kitchy koo!'' She sing-songs. ''You'd better give in baby Dusky, or Auntie May's gonna tickle you until next spring!''

''HAHAHAHAHA! AAAHAHAHAHA! NEHEHEHVEHEHER HAHAHAAAA.''

Hearing this May...

1132111112.content: You sit back and watch as May pants from the foot tickling. You look her over, thinking," where else is she ticklish?" Your eye suddenly catches onto May's sleeve. You get an idea. You pull out another length of rope from your pack, and then walk back toward May. "Come on", she looks warily at the rope," is this really nessacary?" You tell her," I'll untie your feet if you let me tie this on you. "A trade off", May responds, but she thinks," my feet are deathly ticklish, better to risk it." You ask her," is it a deal?" She shrugs, so you tie the rope around her wrists, then untie her ankles. You then use that rope to tie her arms to a tree branch. "Ok", May saids, a little apprehensive. Then, you roll her slevees down, and place your finger in her palm. You slowly circle it as you chant," round and round the garden, like a teddy bear." May suddenly realizes where you where going to tickle her. She began tugging at the rope, but of couse you had tied it tightly. Your fingers creep down her arm as you say," a one step, a two step." May closes her eyes, knowing what was coming next. "And a tickle you under there", you say as your fingers reaches May's underarm and begin to tickle her. "HAHAHAHANOOHAHATHISHAHAISWORSEHAHATHANMYHAHAFEETHAHAHA!" You tickle harder, with all your fingers now. May laughs on. "HAHAHAHASTOPTHATNOTMYARMPITSHAHAHAHAHA!" As you continue to spider tickle her left pit, you reach over and begin to tickle her right. "HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHANOOHAHASTOPHAHA!" After five minutes of tickling May's pale milky underarms, May's face is red and you finally stop and untie her. After she recovers her breath, you tell her," I'm sorry if I tickled you too hard, May." "Are you kidding me, that was fun", May responds. "Fun", you ask. "Yep", May responds," exhausting, but fun." Then she looked at her watch. "Come on", she said," it's getting late." "Alright", you say, beginning to wind the rope up, putting it in your pack," let's go."

14.content:
"DUSK!" your mom yells upstairs, "unless you want to eat your breakfast on the way to school, i suggest you get your neck down here" trying to rub the sleep from your eyes, you pull on your school uniform and drag yourself down into the kitchen.
"Ugh, who turned on the megaphone?" you groan as you start eating your food.
"Good morning to you too sweetie" your mom says, obviously ignoring your "megaphone" comment you said. you roll your eyes, look up to the clock and almost choke when you see the time.
"Ohmanohmanohmanohman, I'm gonna be late" you splutter as you dash out of the kitchen.
"I'm going to be out for most of the day" your mom calls after you, "So you can take the time after school to look around most of the town, just be back by dark, ok"
"OK MOM" you call back as you latch on your roller blades, grab your bag and burst from the door. speeding through the streets, you realise that there's some stragglers still in the streets as you blade through them. looking strait ahead of you, you hardly notice something moving towards you. you look, let out a surprised cry and crash into a bush.
"Aw, man. this is not my day" you groan as you pull yourself to your feet.
"Are you alright?" asks a voice. you look to your right and see a girl standing over you.
you feel yourself go red as you look at her.
"Um.....er.........yes, i'm fine" you mumble.
"Oh, that's good" she says. "I should introduce myself, my name is.........."

141.content:
"Nice to meet you Risa. i'm Dusk" you look at your watch, "and i'm late for school. sorry but i really gotta run"
"If you're in a hurry, i can give you a ride there" you almost fall over when you hear this.
"really?" you say, rather embarresed. she nods and grins at you. "well, ok" you say, blushing a bit.
Risa just giggles at this and gets into her car. pulling off your roller blades, showing your black sock and your white sock, you follow her in. looking out the window, you seem to lose yourself with your surroundings. Risa wonders what's wrong with you and notices your socked feet have slid up onto the seat. grinning slightly, she slides a finger down your black socked foot.
"heyhehehehehehehehehehehehe" you giggle, snapping back to reality.
Risa gives you a sly look and giggles. "What's wrong Dusk, are you ticklish?" she smirks.
"Insanely" you say. "You won't tell anyone, will you?" you ask, rather worried
"Of course not" she says, "you're secrets safe with me"
"Whew, thanks" you say relieved.
"Miss Harada, we've arrived" the driver suddenly interupts.
"Well, i should be going now" you say, smiling. you get out of the car, pull on your roller blades and blade the rest of the way to school.

1541.content:
'Hum, now how did I end up here? I thought this was the way to the park,' I mused, finding myself at a dead end after turning right at an unfamiliar crossroads. 'Didn't that blue cat say going right was the right way? That's what I get for listening to an animal.' I did not want to admit I was lost, yet it was time to turn around. Upon doing so, I smacked into a roller skater.
         'Hoe,' was the cute cry of complaint I heard when I stood up.
         'Hey! Watch where you are,' I trailed off, 'going.' I found myself unable continue scolding the roller skater whose cute face perfectly suited her voice. When she took my hand to help herself stand up, I asked, 'Are you all right?'
         The lass replied, 'Yep! I'm well protected, see?' and showed me her knee and elbow pads. I noticed she was not wearing protective gloves or a helmet, but while I was considering whether she might be skilled or blessed, she introduced herself, 'I'm Sakura! Nice to meet you; good to see you!'
         I smiled at the perky girl and answered, 'I'm Dusk, but if you forget that, call me New Boy.' When I released her hand, her fingers happened to brush my ribs, and I shivered and yipped.
         Sakura grinned widely and asked, 'Dusk, are you ticklish?' Master of all questions, cut energy. Shall I tell this bonny lass? She'll tickle me if I do. She'll tickle me if I don't. Well, honesty is the best policy.
         I blushed and admitted, 'Yes, Sakura, I'm very ticklish.' Flustered though I was at the discovery of one of my weaknesses, nevertheless I seized the chance to flip the question, an old trick guys have probably used for millennia. 'I don't suppose you're ticklish, eh, Sakura?'
         The brunette whose short, pretty hair was almost a shade of orange raised her arms above her head, a movement which raised her T-shirt to expose her midriff. 'Want to find out?' she asked in her cheerfully energetic tone. Now this was a pleasant surprise. I thought she would tickle me silly right off the bat. When I gently wiggled the fingers of my right hand on her bare midriff, her jade eyes sparkled with mirth and she said, 'Hanyaan,' in a blissful voice. She looked and sounded as though I chose a favored spot. I gently squeezed her tummy, then tapped my fingers in a circle around her navel. 'Kyahahahahahaha! Dusk! That tickles so much! Eeeheeheeheeheeheehee!' Sakura laughed happily.

What will happen next?
1541.title: Sakura

choices: You follow Touya and ask Sakura how to contact her.
15413.content:
An accusatory male voice disturbed my pleasant time with Sakura. 'Yo! What do you think you are doing?'

         I smirked, thinking any witness of the scene could clearly see exactly what I was doing: having a merry time tickling a cute girl. A bit of observation would reveal my fingers dancing on her bare midriff to the music of her elated laughter.

         'Wipe that grin off your face and get your hands off my sister,' the source of the voice commanded, walking to stand before me. Out of respect, I did as directed.

         In a voice still light and happy from the tickles, Sakura greeted her big brother, 'Hi Onii-chan! This is my new friend Dusk. Don't worry; we're having a good time playing together.'

         'I can see that,' the older boy replied in a slightly irked tone, 'but he's gone too far.' He introduced himself and warned me, 'I'm Touya. Stay away from my kid sister. Only I'm allowed to tickle her like that.'

         'Sister complex much?' I murmured under my breath.

         'Did you say something?' Touya asked with a glare.

         'Not a thing, Touya,' I replied, shaking my head.

         'I thought not,' he answered smugly, then he began to wax eloquent, 'Big brothers are supposed to tickle their little sisters to smithereens. Where else can they learn the cruelty of the world?'

         Ignoring the rest of his speech, I wondered if he would remove tickling from his repertoire of teasing if he knew she actually liked it. I hoped he would never discover that, for I wanted Sakura to have some playful fun with her brother.

         Finally, he finished his lecture and turned to the bonny lass, addressing her, 'Come, Kaiju, let's go home.' Why Touya nicknamed his pretty little sister the Japanese word for 'monster' was a mystery. Effortlessly, Touya picked up Sakura, roller skates and and all, threw her over his shoulder, and began to walk away. Sakura giggled cutely in protest. Maybe her brother's touch tickled her or perhaps she desired to spend more time with her new friend. I blushed with pleasure, because she considered me her friend after our brief first meeting.

What will happen next?

1553322121.content:
You tumbled into a deep forest and wondered exactly where you were located. This area wasn't like anything you've seen and then it dawned into realization; you were lost. Believing that it wouldn't be good to stay in a woodland with possible enemies lurking nearby, you march forward in order to discover some sort of shelter to reside for the day while you gather your thoughts. After a couple of minutes strolling the pathway, you stumble upon two enormous green gates alongside concrete walls. It resembled some kind of village, but the symbol and japanese letters aren't anything you've regularly come across. Squinting your eyes, you try to make out the words in your head.

'Konoha? Who would call their hometown Leaf Village?' you uttered in your mindscape. The opening was ajar and free to access, yet you hesitate since it is unknown what'd happen if you do so. 'Ah, what the hell...I don't have anything to lose.' you conceded and walked towards the entrance with adagio.

As you approach the unfamiliar town, two voices called out to you on your left. They were definitely not from your usual hometown judging by their appearances. One of them had spiky black hair and dark eyes with a strip of bandage wrapped around his nose whilst the other had freakishly long hair that covered an eyelid, in company with some sort of bandana that possessed the same emblem you detected on the enormous egresses. They beared identical military flak jackets and body suit underneath as well as a red motif on their arm.

"Hey you, in the weird clothes! Come over here." the duo simultaneously ordered. You were a bit confused as to why your outfit was strange; it only consisted of a yellow t-shirt and a pair of blue jeans equal with blue sneakers. Ruffling your short black hair, you advanced to the pair who were waiting patiently. Examining your physique from top to bottom, the brown-haired individual spoke out first: "What is your business here in Konoha?"

You didn't expect this sort of question, so you immediately made up a reasonable excuse: "I am a tourist that came here to visit your fantastic establishment. I simply wish to settle in for a couple of days to admire a different outlook and then I shall take my leave." You twist your fingers, praying that they would buy it and leave you be for the time being.

The two stared at each for a couple of seconds, then nodded in acknowledgement. They grabbed a piece of paper from one of the containers and turned their gaze in your direction. "I see, well that is fine. However, may I grab your name in case of emergencies?" the spiky pelted one asked.

"Sure, my name is Dusk. A pleasure to meet you." you respond graciously.

"It's very nice to meet you as well, my name is Kotetsu Hagane and this is my friend, Izumo Kamizuki." he gestured to the combed man who waved with a sheepish smile. "We are both gatekeepers of this village and it's our job to make sure that no intruders infiltrate against our watch."

You slightly incline with concession; they didn't seem like bad people. They were kind and friendly, as well as understanding. If the inhabitants were as easygoing as these nice fellows, you'd definitely want to remain there, at least until you figure out a way back to your residence.

"In any case, I've never heard the name 'Dusk' before. Where do you come from?" they inquisitively demanded.

You weren't sure if you should tell the truth, so you simply asserted another lie: "I don't actually come from a village, my parents abandoned me during my childhood and I have been traveling the world ever since."

"Ah, that is unfortunate." Kotetsu replied grimly, feeling pity for your fake experience. "It must be quite hard to journey around with many threats out there, which leads me to my next question. Are you a ninja or civilian?"

'Ninja? There are ninjas here?' you expressed your worries mentally. "No, I am a civilian. I guess I must have been lucky to avoid any danger for quite a while." you laughed openly to try to act as believable as possible. You inwardly sighed in relief when they inclined in retaliation. It would be least troublesome if they didn't find out about his lies or else it could bring a lot of unwanted problem.

"Indeed, such luck is extraordinary. In any case, welcome to the Leaf and enjoy your stay!" they bid farewell as you paraded through the outskirts of the foreign habitat. One dilemma was resolved, and now another one materialized itself.

"Hey you!" someone yelled from the distance. Turning around, you notice an unaccustomed figure that was sprinting towards you.

15533221211.content:
The screeching character ran in the vicinity of your general direction at an alarming pace. The female had her arms behind her back perpendicularly as she did so, quite a different posture than you're used to. This simply provided further evidence that the offshore suburb's culture was considerably distinctive of your own and you pondered whether or not you were still in the same timeline. The citizens wore unusual clothing that consisted of kimonos and long-sleeved pullovers. Another strange detail was that they displayed sandals likewise.

Meanwhile, the unknown personage inaugurated herself in front of you. Her attire was as perplexing as the rest of the villagers. She sported a red tank top with a white insignia on the back that retained a circular ornament. Her lower-half adorned a pinkish apricorn skirt overneath black shorts and an analogous item pouch as the two fellows prior. In addition, the young lady maintained black boots that stopped under her kneecaps and left her delightful toes uncovered. Alongside these accessories, she bore pink elbow protectors and dark gloves as well as a crimson headband on her head with the carbon symbol which you've witnessed before. Despite her odd appearance, the stranger was still attractive in your book and you perceived awkwardness whilst she glanced at your image.

"I'm very sorry to disturb you," the youngster commenced with politeness, "but you don't seem like you come from Konoha. It is rather suspicious, if you ask me, since we've had issues with intruders in the past." the broad expressed her concerns.

"Oh, I understand." you retorted in your reassuring tone. "You're right, I'm not from around here. I am simply a visitor, or tourist if you will. I've been traveling my entire life in order to discover many regions and experience every sort of civilizations out there and I just so happened to come across your village. That being said, I was allowed to spend some time in your outskirt."

"Ah, that is very nice. You must have seen many kinds of people and areas, I'm kind of jealous." the teen stated in awe. "Oh, where are my manners? My name is Sakura Haruno and I am a kunoichi. Currently, I hold the rank of chunin and I am our Hokage's apprentice. If I may ask, what is your name?" she extended her hand in a friendly gesture.

"My name is Dusk, a pleasure to meet you." you responded with an honest smile, accepting the handshake presented adjacent of you. As you made contact with her delicate appendage, you were amazed by its softness. Nonetheless, you were quite curious about a few subjects and you voiced your anxiety. "By the way, what's a Hokage?"

Your new acquaintance observed you as if you were insane or plainly stupid. "Are you joking? You don't know what a Hokage is?" the rosen colleen uttered dumbstruck while you merely scratch your cranium in reply. The shinobi openly sighed and decided to elaborate: "Seriously, you sound like my teammate. Anyways, a Kage is the governing leader of a village and they are incredibly powerful. That being said, there are four of them in the Fire country, each with different titles depending on the region they're from. For instance, ours is the Hokage and her name is Lady Tsunade. Shishou is the best medic and she fought in the third shinobi war."

You nod your skull in understanding, this was useful information that you could keep track of in the back of your mind. If the commander was as powerful as she mentioned, then it would be essential to stay on her good side if you didn't want to be pulverised later on.

"By the way, do you want me to show you around? I've lived here pretty much my whole life and I wouldn't mind to give you a little tour." Sakura proposed with a beam. Peering at her gorgeous jade eyes, you solely could not refuse her offer at all cost. In essence, this was a great opportunity to gain more knowledge on your surroundings and it was better than patrolling on your own. With no other doubt in your brain, you welcome her recommendation with wide arms and you two departed onto the expedition. Throughout your trip, you've frequented many interesting locations, such as the hot spring, the Hokage monument and the training fields. The sights were fantastic, but you've realized that you haven't eaten in quite some time.

"Hungry, eh? Come with me, I know just the place..." your tour guide stated. She then took you to...
15533221211.title: Sakura's Arrival

choices: Give that belly a good tickle.
Lightly scratch and tease her underarms.
155332212112.content:
The juvenile fellow led you to a little outlet in the corner of the pathway. Gazing at the japanese letters written upwards, you assume that this was a Dango shop, otherwise known as a diner that served dumplings as their specialty. Truth be told, you never digested those kind of nutriments prior to this, so you were formerly dubious about entering the small boutique. However, a gentle smile from your companion told you otherwise and you merely exhaled in abandon; it would be against common courtesy to refuse her preposition. Conceding to your fate, you marched within its premises with your associate by your side.

The first thing you notice when you set foot in the restaurant was that there weren't many people residing in it. A couple was installed in the corner, appreciating their lovely conversations without a single care in the world. The cashier was an aged woman with a wrinkled countenance. Your contact seemed familiar with the dame, probably because she came here often during her spare time. Sakura slightly inclined in a sign of respect and politeness, whilst you instinctively copied the same gesture.

"Oho, you brought your boyfriend with you this time?" the elder teased her beloved customer, whom blushed by the precipitous comment. "I don't really know about his clothing, but he is certainly cute. Reminds me of my husband when he took me out for dinner, back in the days..."

"N-no...we're not dating. I'm just showing him around." the embarrassed kunoichi denied as the both of you crimson. "Please don't take it the wrong way."

"Ohehehehee, if you say so." she wavered her off.

After the awkward situation, you chose to sit at a random table with nobody around. It would be pretty bad to attract unwanted attention whilst you conduct a chat with your partner. It was a desk with four chairs; two of them respectively at each sides. The pink-haired shinobi picked a random one out of them all, while you wondered which of them you should select. Ultimately, you preferred to rest besides the lovely adolescent with her permission, whom appeared hesitant beforehand, though permitted nonetheless. You placed an order for a couple of the café's specialty for the both of you, after much convincing on your intermediary's part.

"Right...Sakura? Can I ask you a few questions about your hometown? If you don't mind, of course." you inquired inquisitively. At the moment, it was the best occasion to ask since opportunities like this would not come by easily.

"Sure, what would you like to know?" the youthful beauty pleasantly complied.

"Can you tell me a little more about the ninjas in your village? I'm a civilian, more or less, so I don't know much about their functions in society. I'm very interested in becoming one as well, but I'd rather be informed about their procedures before I do anything reckless."

"Oh, I get you. In order to become a proper shinobi, you need to have gone through the academy where they teach you the basics." she began. "Once you've experienced their tutor, you'll have to pass the academy test where they examine everything you've learned since the beginning. It's not very complicated. Once you've succeeded in doing so, you'll be assigned to a three-man cell alongside a sensei and you'll go through missions together as well as training sessions." the young girl paused for a second, deep into thought. "Then, if your team performance is adequate enough, your teacher will recommend you for the chunin exams and everything will depend on your score there."

As she was explaining, your food arrived and it looked quite delicious. The discussion temporarily dropped as you two savour your tasty gourmet. It was much better than you've imagined, and you couldn't help yourself by consuming several more to satisfy your hunger, which prompted a few giggles from your escort. Once you realized you weren't alone, you cleared your throat and allowed the gal to feast upon the remainder, much to her appreciation.

"So, you must have had a squad of your own, right?" you abruptly questioned while she nibbled her meal. The query almost made her choke on her food and the mood darkened all of a sudden. The rose damsel's bangs hid her pupils and it was then that you knew that you've accessed undesirable territory.

"Yes, I had a team. But now, we've split up after some...complications." Sakura halted. You weren't sure what to say at that specific occurrence, so you stayed silent. "I-I'm sorry, I didn't mean to bother you with my life. Let's just keep eating, okay?" With a nod, you resumed your assimilation. The atmosphere was much more uncomfortable afterwards, and you needed to do something to cheer up the depressive aura. The problem is, you don't know how.

Unanticipatedly, the female teenager brought her arms backwards and stretched, arching her back. In repercussion, her shirt heaved upwards and exposed her elegant pale-white stomach. The hem of her top hovered above her belly button, and you couldn't help but gaze upon its magnificence; it was an oval innie that seemed very deep and begging to be poked. Her skin was so perfect and alluring, but her armpits were as welcoming as her abdomen. You believed that this could be a good way to brighten her emotions, yet you have a tough decision to make. What do you do?
